comments.body: reduceToSize is no longer exposed in 2.13. This should work alike, though does a little more work than reduceToSize does.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +368,372 @@      val elem = buffer(index)
      buffer(index) = buffer(buffer.size - 1)  // This also works if index == buffer.size - 1
      buffer.trimEnd(1)
      elem
    }
